News.headline: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham & Redbridge vs. Worthing
News.page_title: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham & Redbridge vs. Worthing
News.URL_keywords: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham & Redbridge vs. Worthing
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Dagger's Buildbase FA Trophy 1st Round game against Worthing on Saturday 10th December.
News.description:
Don't miss out on our reduced prices for our Buildbase FA Trophy home fixture agaisnt Worthing, season tickets are not valid for cup games, so make sure you get your tickets for the game.

Please note that the TBS stand will be closed for this game for both home and away fans and the AGP Steel Family Stand will be open for Away Fans.

Junior & Under 10 tickets are reduced to £1.00 in advance but go up to £5.00 on the day.

Admission prices for the game:

Carling & Family Stand:
Adults - £12.00
Concessions - £8.00
10-16 - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day
Under 10's - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day
*when purchased with an adult ticket.

Terraces:
Adults - £10.00
Concessions - £6.00
10-16 - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day
Under 10s - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day
*when purchased with an adult ticket.

Individual tickets can also be purchased on-line, on the phone and in the club shop.

Purchase:
Online:www.daggerstickets.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21
Club shop: Opening Times
